metadata.name: Fiona A Través De Los Ojos De Los Niños #1
metadata.description: The children of Flor de Loto Montessori School in Ponce, Puerto Rico captured through their drawings their feelings, emotions and experiences lived during Hurricane Fiona.  These are works of art inspired by their reasoning and imaginative mind. Worked in a simple and pure way with colored pencils, crayons, markers on white paper canvases. Materials accessible at this time of national emergency.
